     int port,
     AbstractAI ai)

        Parameters:

        port - Port of the client
        ai - Reference to the AI. Put "this" for this parameter

      • getKilledPlanes

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Plane.FullView> getKilledPlanes()
        Get the planes that no longer exists in the game. If a plane is in this list, it means that he has been destroyed. Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getMyPlanes

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Plane.FullView> getMyPlanes()
        Get the planes that your AI own Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getEnnemyPlanes

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Plane.BasicView> getEnnemyPlanes()
        Get all the visible ennemy planes An ennemy plane is visible only if at least one of your entity sees it Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getAllBases

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Base.BasicView> getAllBases()
        Get all the bases of the game Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getMyBases

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Base.FullView> getMyBases()
        Get the bases which your AI own Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getVisibleBase

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Base.FullView> getVisibleBase()
        Get all the bases visibles (owned and not owned) Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getNotOwnedAndVisibleBases

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Base.FullView> getNotOwnedAndVisibleBases()
        Get the bases which your AI see but does not own Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getNotOwnedAndNotVisibleBases

        public MapView<java.lang.Integer,Base.BasicView> getNotOwnedAndNotVisibleBases()
        Get the bases which your AI neither see nor own Warning: This effectively creates a new map at every call and exposes a view of it

      • getCountry

        public Country.View getCountry()
        Get the country of your AI

      • isTimeOut

        public boolean isTimeOut()
        Check if you are out of time. If this returns true, it means that your AI is probably too long to send commands

      • updateSimFrame

        public void updateSimFrame()
        This function allows you to get the next frame of the game. Calling this function will block you until the next game frame is available on the server

      • sendCommand

        public void sendCommand(Command c)
        Send a command to the server. Calling this function will not block you.
        Parameters:
        c - The command to be sent

      • quit

        public void quit(int code)
        Quit the proxy
        Parameters:
        code - The code that will be sen
